trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Saskatoon
There were no other sightings in Saskatoon on or around August 23rd 2011
Summary: star-like object blinks out to nothing over saskatoon
divs: sighting detailsit was between 10:30pm-11:00pm august 23rd. this was viewed from the east side of the city. i was inside taking care of a few chores before bed and my boyfriend was outside having a smoke. suddenly i hear him yelling for me to run outside. he points to the sky and asks, "what is that?" and together we look up. there is a light, about the same size\brightness\color as the surrounding stars, moving very slowly. i brushed it off as an airplane, albeit a very strange looking one. it was almost over head, a little south, and moving eastward. it was moving in a straight line but then got a little shaky and sporadic, although still running a straight course. he runs out to the street to try and get a better look and he lost view of it in the process. i watched the entire time and suddenly the light started to shrink, it changed color to a darker orange, and then blinked out to nothing. in the same area appeared 4 more star-like things, the same darker orange as the original light had turned before it blinked out. they didn't move. they simple blinked on in a diamond shape, lasted about 5 seconds, then blinked out. the last 4 lights were very, very faint. he didn't catch those, only i did. the whole thing happened so quickly i didn't even have time to think about grabbing a camera to record what was happening. it was the first time i've witnessed anything of the sort.
